definition: to rectify (alternating current to direct current)
exactly/in good order/whole/complete/entire/in order/orderly/to repair/to mend/to renovate/(coll.) to fix sb/to give sb a hard time/to mess with sb
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)

sentences.english: Stationary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 固定陽極，單焦點，橋式硅整流，油浸自冷組合式。

sentences.english: To celebrate, he had the cowling and struts of his fighter painted bright blue.
sentences.chinese: 慶祝，他有整流罩和他的戰士的高視闊步畫鮮豔藍色。

sentences.english: Dense smoke coming out of No. 4 engine cowling (engine nacelle), fire suspected.
sentences.chinese: 第四號發動機整流罩冒濃煙，可能着火。

sentences.english: Repair or replace the electric brush; clean the commutator surface by abrasive paper and blow it clean.
sentences.chinese: 修理或調換電刷，用木砂紙清理整流子表面，並吹淨。

sentences.english: IR2172 is a current sensing IC presented by International Rectifier Company.
sentences.chinese: IR2172是國際整流器公司推出的電流傳感芯片。

sentences.english: The rectifier is supplied by the normal AC input.
sentences.chinese: 整流器是所提供的正常交流輸入。

sentences.english: Use half wave rectifying power supply must add free-wheeling diode.
sentences.chinese: 使用半波整流電源必需加裝續流二極管。

sentences.english: This effect, in analogy to its radiofrequency counterpart, is known as optical rectification.
sentences.chinese: 同它的射頻對應物相仿，這種現象稱爲光學整流。

sentences.english: Its input transformer adopts phase-shift technology to implement a multiplex rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 其輸入變壓器採用移相技術，以實現多重化整流。

sentences.english: A diode used in this manner is called a rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 按這種方式使用的二極管叫做整流管。

sentences.english: Diffused junction type silicon diode, 1,0A ultrahigh-speed rectifier.
sentences.chinese: 擴散結型硅二極管，1，0一個超高速整流器。

sentences.english: The structure of the flows is predicted accurately.
sentences.chinese: 準確預測了底坎整流的流動場結構。

sentences.english: One of the key factors of affecting power factor of rectifiers is control technique.
sentences.chinese: 控制技術是影響整流器功率因數的關鍵因素之一。

sentences.english: The two ends of the wire are connected to a split-ring commutator.
sentences.chinese: 導線的兩端聯接到裂環整流器。

sentences.english: Rotary anode, single focus, and bridge silicon rectification, The X-ray generator is an oil-immersed self-cooled unit.
sentences.chinese: 旋轉陽極，單焦點，橋式硅整流，油浸自冷組合式。

sentences.english: The author studied the transient process of a full-wave bridge rectified filter when it was switched on in the circuit.
sentences.chinese: 研究了全波橋式整流濾波器接入電路時的暫態過程。

definition: rectifier (transforming alternating electric current to direct current)
filtering radio waves (i.e. to pick out one frequency)
abbr. for 光耦合器[guang1 ou3 he2 qi4]
